description:
Koizumi-san is a reserved and mysterious high school girl.
Her classmate Ohsawa Yuu is very interested in this new transfer student. 
One day on her way home, she happens to see Koizumi-san in a long line in front of a ramen shop, which leads to them eating ramen together, and yet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Garlic with Extra Vegetables / Maayu / Rich
Un ramen avec de l`ail et une grosse portion de légumes / Huile d`ail noir / Soupe très riche
Yasai Mashi Ninniku Karame / Maayu / Kotteri
ヤサイマシニンニクカラメ / まーゆ / こってり
채소 듬뿍 마늘 매운 맛 / 마유 / 진듯한 맛
